172  class DTNode
173  {
174  public:
175  DTNode() {} //for de-serialization
176  DTNode(Beliefs catBel) : catBel_(catBel) {}
177  virtual ~DTNode() {}
178 
179  //major category for given node
180  AttrIdd getMajorCategory() const {
181  if( catBel_.empty() )
182  return AttrDomain::getUnknownId();
183  else
184  return catBel_.front().getValue();
185  }
186 
187  //categories with belief for given node
188  const Beliefs& getBeliefs() const { return catBel_; }
189 
190  //test if the node is leaf node
191  bool isLeaf() const { return getTest() == 0L; }
192 
193  //factory method
194  static PDTNode createLeaf(const Beliefs& catBel);
195  //factory method
196  static PDTNode createInternal(const Beliefs& catBel, const DTTest& test, PDTNode nTrue, PDTNode nFalse);
197 
198  //empty node - node when test return true
199  virtual PDTNode getNodeTrue() const { return PDTNode(); }
200  //empty node - node when test return false
201  virtual PDTNode getNodeFalse() const { return PDTNode(); }
202  //test stored in node (null)
203  virtual const DTTest* getTest() const { return 0L; }
205  virtual void setNodeTrue(PDTNode) { }
206  /*** mutator - set node when test return false. Empty operation for LeafNode. */
207  virtual void setNodeFalse(PDTNode) { }
208 
210  virtual AttrIdd getCategory(const ExampleTest& e) const {
211  return getMajorCategory();
212  }
213 
215  virtual const Beliefs& getCategories(const ExampleTest& e) const {
216  return getBeliefs();
217  }
218 
219  //for debugging
220  virtual void write(std::ostream& os) const {
221  os << "Leaf (Major:" << getMajorCategory()->get() << ", Beliefs:" << getBeliefs() << ");";
222  }
223  private:
225  friend class boost::serialization::access;

229  ar & boost::serialization::make_nvp("CatBel", catBel_ );
230  }

241  class DTNodeInternal : public DTNode {
242  public:
243  DTNodeInternal() {} //for de-serialization
244  DTNodeInternal(const Beliefs& catBel, const DTTest& test, PDTNode nTrue, PDTNode nFalse)
245  : DTNode(catBel), test_(test), nodeTrue_(nTrue), nodeFalse_(nFalse)
246  {}
247 
248  //node when test return true
249  virtual PDTNode getNodeTrue() const { return nodeTrue_; }
250  //node when test return false
251  virtual PDTNode getNodeFalse() const { return nodeFalse_; }
252  //test stored in node
253  virtual const DTTest* getTest() const { return &test_; }
255  virtual void setNodeTrue(PDTNode n) { nodeTrue_ = n; }
256  /*** mutator - set node when test return false. Empty operation for LeafNode. */
257  virtual void setNodeFalse(PDTNode n) { nodeFalse_ = n; }
258 
260  virtual AttrIdd getCategory(const ExampleTest& e) const {
261  if( test_.test(e) )
262  return nodeTrue_->getCategory(e);
263  else
264  return nodeFalse_->getCategory(e);
265  }
266 
268  virtual const Beliefs& getCategories(const ExampleTest& e) const {
269  if( test_.test(e) )
270  return nodeTrue_->getCategories(e);
271  else
272  return nodeFalse_->getCategories(e);
273  }
274 
275  //for debugging
276  virtual void write(std::ostream& os) const {
277  os << "Internal (Major:" << this->getMajorCategory()->get() << ", Beliefs:" << this->getBeliefs() << ", test:";
278  test_.write(os);
279  os << ");";
280  }
281  private:

285  template<class Archive>
286  void serialize( Archive &ar, const unsigned int /* file_version*/ ){
287  ar & boost::serialization::make_nvp("NodeBase", boost::serialization::base_object<DTNode>(*this) );
288  ar & boost::serialization::make_nvp("Test", test_ );
289  ar & boost::serialization::make_nvp("NodeTrue", nodeTrue_ );
290  ar & boost::serialization::make_nvp("NodeFalse", nodeFalse_ );
291  }
292  private:
293  DTTest test_; //binary test
294  PDTNode nodeTrue_; //node when test return true
295  PDTNode nodeFalse_; //node when test return false
296  };

351  template<typename Val>
352  void DecisionTree<Val>::reset() {
353  root_ = PDTNode();
354  }
355 
361  template<typename Val>
362  void DecisionTree<Val>::train(const ExamplesTrain& e) {
363 
364  ExamplesTrain ex(e); //make a copy, because the container will be changed (split re-order examples in sets)
365  std::set<AttrIdd> attrib; // structure for available tests for train examples collection
366 
367  // Look through all examples and remove redundant attributes, if exists
368  for (typename ExamplesTrain::iterator it = ex.begin(); it != ex.end(); ++it) {
369  for(typename ExampleTrain::iterator at = it->begin(); at != it->end();) {
370  AttrIdd& value = *at;
371  if( std::find(Classifier<Val>::getAttrDomains().begin(),
372  Classifier<Val>::getAttrDomains().end(),
373  value->getDomain()->getId()) != Classifier<Val>::getAttrDomains().end())
374  ++at;
375  else
376  at = it->erase(at);
377 
378  }
379  // generate available tests for train examples collection
380  const ExampleTrain& ee = *it;
381  std::copy(ee.begin(), ee.end(), std::inserter(attrib, attrib.begin() ) );
382  }
383 
384  DTTests tests;
385  std::transform(attrib.begin(), attrib.end(), std::back_inserter(tests),
386  boost::lambda::bind(boost::lambda::constructor<DTTest>(), boost::lambda::_1 ) );
387 
388  root_ = buildTreeRecur(ex.begin(), ex.end(), tests, param_.allowedNbrMiscEx);
389 
390  }
391 
393  template<typename Val>
394  typename DecisionTree<Val>::AttrIdd DecisionTree<Val>::getCategory(const ExampleTest& e) const {
395  if(!root_) { //empty tree
396  return AttrIdd(AttrDomain::getUnknownId());
397  } else if(e.empty() ) { //no common attrib (domains) between example and classifier
398  return root_->getMajorCategory();
399  } else { //classify using decision tree
400  return root_->getCategory(e);
401  }
402  }
403 
405  template<typename Val>
406  typename DecisionTree<Val>::Beliefs DecisionTree<Val>::getCategories(const ExampleTest& e) const {
407  if(!root_) { //empty tree
408  return Beliefs();
409  } else if(e.empty() ) { //no common attrib (domains) between example and classifier
410  return root_->getBeliefs();
411  } else { //classify using decision tree
412  return root_->getCategories(e);
413  }
414  }
415 
417  template<typename Val>
418  void DecisionTree<Val>::write(std::ostream& os) const {
419  if(!root_)
420  os << "Empty DTC" << std::endl;
421  else
422  writeDecTreeNodes(os, root_, 0 );
423  }
424 
433  template<typename Val>
434  void DecisionTree<Val>::prune(const ExamplesTrain& e) {
435  if(root_) {
436  ExamplesTrain ex(e); //make a copy, because the container will be changed (split re-order examples in sets)
437  pruneTreeRecur(ex.begin(), ex.end(), root_ );
438  }
439  }
440 
447  template<typename Val>
448  typename DecisionTree<Val>::PDTNode
449  DecisionTree<Val>::buildTreeRecur(typename ExamplesTrain::iterator eBeg, typename ExamplesTrain::iterator eEnd,
450  const DTTests& inTests, const int ALLOWED_NBR_MISC_EX) {
451 
452  //calculate histogram of categories for train example collection
453 
454  TrainExampleCategoryCounters<Val> counters(eBeg, eEnd);
455  Beliefs histogram = counters.getHistogram();
456 
457  int numCatWithManyExamples = 0;
458  const std::map<AttrIdd,int>& c = counters.get();
459  for(typename std::map<AttrIdd,int>::const_iterator i = c.begin(); i != c.end(); ++i) {
460  if( i->second > ALLOWED_NBR_MISC_EX) {
461  ++numCatWithManyExamples;
462  }
463  }
464  if(static_cast<int>(std::distance(eBeg, eEnd)) <= ALLOWED_NBR_MISC_EX || //no enough training examples - split is not sensible
465  numCatWithManyExamples < 2) { //only few examples in not-major category
466  return DTNode::createLeaf(histogram);
467  }
468  //find the best test
469  DTTests tests(inTests);
470  typename DTTests::iterator best = tests.end();
471  double bestEntropy = std::numeric_limits<double>::min();
472 
473  for(typename DTTests::iterator i = tests.begin(); i != tests.end(); ++i ) {
474  double entr = i->entropyGain(eBeg, eEnd);
475  if(entr > bestEntropy) {
476  bestEntropy = entr;
477  best = i;
478  }
479  }
480  if( best == tests.end() || bestEntropy < MIN_INF_GAIN ) { //no tests in tests set or no goot tests
481  return DTNode::createLeaf(histogram);
482  }
483  // std::cout << "best test:" << *best << " entropy gain:" << bestEntropy << std::endl;
484 
485  //split the examples using best test
486  typename ExamplesTrain::iterator middle = std::stable_partition(eBeg, eEnd, boost::bind(&DTTest::test, boost::ref(*best), _1) );
487  DTTest bestTest(*best);
488  tests.erase(best);
489  PDTNode nTrue = buildTreeRecur(eBeg, middle, tests, ALLOWED_NBR_MISC_EX);
490  PDTNode nFalse = buildTreeRecur(middle, eEnd, tests, ALLOWED_NBR_MISC_EX);
491  return DTNode::createInternal(histogram, bestTest, nTrue, nFalse);
492  }
493 
499  template<typename Val>
500  typename DecisionTree<Val>::PDTNode
501  DecisionTree<Val>::pruneTreeRecur(typename ExamplesTrain::iterator eBeg, typename ExamplesTrain::iterator eEnd, PDTNode node) {
502 
503  if(node->isLeaf() || std::distance(eBeg, eEnd) < 1)
504  return node;
505 
506  //here assertion that for !node->isLeaf() node->getTest() return valid address
507  const DTTest& t = *(node->getTest());
508  //split the examples using the test from node
509  typename ExamplesTrain::iterator
510  middle = std::stable_partition(eBeg, eEnd, boost::bind(&DTTest::test, boost::ref(t), _1) );
511 
512  node->setNodeTrue( pruneTreeRecur( eBeg, middle, node->getNodeTrue() ) );
513  node->setNodeFalse( pruneTreeRecur( middle, eEnd, node->getNodeFalse() ) );
514 
515  //count the number of correctly classified pruning exampes
516  int leafCount = 0, treeCount = 0;
517  for(typename ExamplesTrain::const_iterator i = eBeg; i != eEnd; ++i) {
518  const ExampleTrain& e = *i;
519  if(node->getMajorCategory() == e.getFeature() )
520  ++leafCount;
521  if(node->getCategory(e) == e.getFeature())
522  ++treeCount;
523  }
524  // std::cout << "pruning:" << *node << " examples:" << std::distance(eBeg, eEnd)
525  // << " leafCount: " << leafCount << " treeCount: " << treeCount << std::endl;
526  if( leafCount >= treeCount ) { //major category for node is good enough
527  return DTNode::createLeaf(node->getBeliefs()); //switch to leaf
528  }
529  return node;
530  }
531 
535  template<typename Val>
536  void DecisionTree<Val>::writeDecTreeNodes(std::ostream& os, typename DecisionTree<Val>::PDTNode node, int level) {
537  if( node ) {
538  os << std::string(level,' ');
539  node->write(os);
540  os << std::endl;
541  writeDecTreeNodes(os, node->getNodeTrue(), level+1);
542  writeDecTreeNodes(os, node->getNodeFalse(), level+1);
543  }
544  }
545 
547  // class DecisionTree::DTTest implementation
549 
551  template<typename Val>
552  double DecisionTree<Val>::DTTest::entropyGain(typename ExamplesTrain::const_iterator eBeg, typename ExamplesTrain::const_iterator eEnd) const {
553 
554  if( eBeg == eEnd ) //not start calculation for empty set
555  return 0.0;
556 
557  TrainExampleCategoryCounters<Val> acc;
558  TrainExampleCategoryCounters<Val> nacc;
559 
560  for(typename ExamplesTrain::const_iterator i = eBeg; i != eEnd; ++ i) {
561  const ExampleTrain& ex = *i;
562  if( this->test(ex) ) {
563  acc.inc(ex);
564  }
565  else {
566  nacc.inc(ex);
567  }
568  }
569  double sum = static_cast<double>( std::distance(eBeg, eEnd) );
570  double nrAcc = static_cast<double>(acc.getSum() );
571  double nrNAcc = static_cast<double>(nacc.getSum() );
572  double testIc = calcEntropy( nrAcc / sum ) + calcEntropy( nrNAcc/sum );
573  if( testIc < MIN_INF_GAIN ) {
574  return 0.0;
575  }
576  else {
577  double entropy = acc.entropy() * nrAcc / sum + nacc.entropy() * nrNAcc / sum;
578  TrainExampleCategoryCounters<Val> befSplit(eBeg, eEnd);
579  double gain = befSplit.entropy() - entropy;
580  return gain / testIc;
581  }
582  }
583 
585  template<typename Val>
586  bool DecisionTree<Val>::DTTest::test( const ExampleTest& e ) const {
587  return std::find(e.begin(), e.end(), idd_) != e.end();
588  }
589 
591  template<typename Val>
592  void DecisionTree<Val>::DTTest::write(std::ostream& os) const {
593  os << "Domain: " << idd_->getDomain()->getId() << ", Value:" << idd_->get();
594  }
